```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r example, echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, results = "hide"}

library(exuber)

# Simulate data witn n = 100 observations
set.seed(112)
sim1 <- sim_dgp1(n = 100) # one bubble
sim2 <- sim_dgp2(n = 100) # two bubbles

dta <- data.frame(
  "onebubble" = sim1, 
  "twobbubbles" = sim2)

ts <- radf(dta, lag = 1)
```

Report t-stats with the assigned critical values

```{r Summary, eval = TRUE}
summary(ts)
```

Date stamp periods of explosive behaviour
```{r Datestamp, eval = TRUE}
datestamp(ts)
```

### Plotting

The output of autoplot is a list of ggplots


```{r plotting, echo=TRUE, eval = TRUE, fig.width=9}
ts %>% 
  autoplot() %>% 
  ggarrange()
```
